data.name: Switch1
data.value: Compare our phone and broadband deals above and choose your preferred package

data.name: Switch2
data.value: Sign up and we’ll organise the switch from your current supplier

data.name: Switch3
data.value: We’ll email your important documents, and let you know if you need an engineer to visit

data.name: Switch4
data.value: We’ll post you a wireless broadband router. Plug it in on the day of the switch – you’re connected and ready to go!

data.name: SwitchHeader
data.value: Switching your phone and broadband to us is easy

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph1
data.value: Our 19 range of broadband and phone packages is available to customers with a suitable phone line.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph2
data.value: There is an 18-month fixed term contract on our broadband packages, leaving SSE before the end of that term may incur early termination charges.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph3
data.value: The price displayed is the monthly cost of the broadband, phone line and optional call package for the duration of your 18-month contract. We’ll remind you before the end of your contract that your package price will change. If you do nothing, from month 19, you will move onto a rolling contract and pay the monthly price applicable to your package at that time.

data.name: BroadbandAverageSpeedTermsPreLink
data.value: The broadband speeds noted above are average speeds at times of peak usage. These are subject to our Broadband Traffic Management Policy and Acceptable Use Policy. Further details can be found at

data.name: BroadbandAverageSpeedTermsLinkText
data.value: sse.co.uk/legal-regulation-broadband

data.name: BroadbandAverageSpeedTermsLinkUrl
data.value: https://sse.co.uk/legal-regulation-broadband

data.name: BroadbandAverageSpeedTermsPostLink
data.value: . An indication of the speed you may receive will be provided before the point of sale. Actual speeds are dependent upon the length and quality of the copper line between your home and your exchange or street cabinet as well as environmental factors within your home such as Wi-Fi interference and your in-home wiring, as well as congestion on the service you are accessing.

data.name: BroadbandAverageSpeedTermsLinkAltText
data.value: Link to see important information about our broadband and phone packages

data.name: FrustrationFreeHeader
data.value: Welcome to Frustration-Free Broadband

data.name: FrustrationFreeParagraph
data.value: We’re proud to offer our customers great value broadband at fantastic speeds. But there’s more to consider when choosing your broadband than just price and speed. That’s why we’ve introduced Frustration-Free Broadband. It’s simple, straightforward, and applies to all our packages.

data.name: AccordionBroadbandChargesHeader
data.value: No upfront broadband charges

data.name: AccordionBroadbandChargesHeaderTitle
data.value: Link to see important information about our no upfront broadband charges

data.name: AccordionBroadbandChargesParagraph
data.value: No broadband connection charge, and no postage or delivery charges. The only exception will be if you don’t have an active BT/Openreach phone line, we’ll arrange for an engineer to install one. This will cost £{0} and we’ll add this charge to a future bill.

data.name: AccordionHappinessGuaranteeHeader
data.value: Happiness Guarantee

data.name: AccordionHappinessGuaranteeHeaderTitle
data.value: Link to see important information about our happiness guarantee

data.name: AccordionHappinessGuaranteeParagraph
data.value: If you’re not completely satisfied with our service, you can leave for free within the first 60 days.

data.name: AccordionHappinessGuaranteeParagraph2
data.value: is for customers signing up for an SSE fixed-term broadband and phone package bundle. They can leave their contract without early termination charges within the first 60 days, if they’re not happy with any aspect of the service they have received, and we have been unable to fix the problem.

data.name: AccordionPricePromiseHeader
data.value: Price Promise

data.name: AccordionPricePromiseHeaderTitle
data.value: Link to see important information about our price promise

data.name: AccordionPricePromiseParagraph
data.value: Zero price hikes during your 18-month contract.

data.name: AccordionPricePromiseParagraph2
data.value: Price promise is to keep phone and broadband package prices fixed for the duration of the contract from your package start date. The only exception will be any increases to VAT or any other relevant tax/levy. The monthly package price includes your monthly broadband, line rental and selected call package.

data.name: CancellationHeader
data.value: Cancellation and Early Termination Charges

data.name: CancellationParagraph1
data.value: The following charges may apply following cancellation of the broadband contract:

data.name: CancellationParagraph3
data.value: For termination at any point between the broadband service start date and the end of 18th month of the contract there is an early termination charge for every day remaining of the contract. This is 32p per day for Unlimited Broadband (19) with a maximum charge of £178.20 per contract. For Unlimited Fibre (19) this is 36p per day with a maximum charge of £199.80 per contract. For Unlimited Fibre Plus (19) it’s 44p per day with a maximum charge of £243.00 per contract. These charges are not subject to VAT.

data.name: CancellationParagraph4
data.value: These packages are covered by our ‘Happiness Guarantee’ promise, which waives termination charges applicable on your contract if you decide to leave due to dissatisfaction with the broadband service provided by SSE. The ‘Happiness Guarantee’ applies only to the first 60 days of this fixed term contract. More details can be found on our website, in the broadband regulatory page: https://sse.co.uk/help/phone-and-broadband/regulations-broadband

data.name: FrustrationFreeAccordionsHeader
data.value: Here’s what Frustration-Free Broadband means for you:

data.name: HappinessGuaranteeFullDetailsLinkText

data.name: HappinessGuaranteeLinkText
data.value: Happiness Guarantee

data.name: HappinessGuaranteeLinkUrl
data.value: /Areas/Common/Content/PDFs/SSE Broadband Happiness Guarantee Nov 2019.pdf

data.name: HappinessGuaranteeParagraph
data.value: Customers signing up for SSE fixed-term broadband and phone package bundles can leave their contract without early termination charges if, within the first 60 days, they are not happy with any aspect of the service they have received, and we have been unable to fix the problem.

data.name: AddedOnLink
data.value: Added

data.name: NoCallPackages
data.value: No call packages available

data.name: CancellationParagraph2
data.value: If you cancel your broadband order before your service start date, there will be no charge unless you have already received your router and you do not return this to us. When you notify us of your cancellation, we will send you a prepaid postage envelope for the return of the router. Should you not return your router within 30 working days an equipment charge of £{0} will be added to your account.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph1FixAndFibreV3
data.value: Our 18 Month Fix and Fibre broadband and phone packages are available to customers with a suitable phone line.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph2FixAndFibreV3
data.value: There's an 18-month fixed term contract on our broadband and phone packages. Leaving SSE before the end of that term may incur early termination charges.

data.name: CancellationParagraph3FixAndFibreV3
data.value: If you cancel your broadband and phone package before the end of the 18-month contract, there will be a termination fee of 38 pence per day remaining of the 18-month contract for fibre broadband.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph3FixAndFibre
data.value: The price displayed is the monthly cost of the broadband, phone line and optional call package for the duration of your {0}-month contract. At the end of the 18-month term, your Broadband and Phone contract will roll onto a non-fixed-term contract. This currently costs {1} per month, but prices are subject to change. We’ll write to you in advance to advise you of this and what steps you need to take if you do not wish to continue.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph3FixAndFibreV3
data.value: The price displayed is the monthly cost of the broadband, phone line and optional call package for the duration of your 18-month contract. At the end of the 18-month term, your broadband and phone contract will roll onto a non-fixed-term contract. This currently costs £27 per month for fibre broadband, but prices are subject to change. We’ll write to you in advance to advise you of this and what steps you need to take if you do not wish to continue.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsParagraph4FixAndFibre
data.value: You can upgrade your broadband package at any time, but this may terminate the Fix and Fibre broadband discount. You can change your phone package at any time without affecting the Fix and Fibre broadband discount you are receiving.
